title: Create simple Web App for taxi business for customers to book trips online using escrow payment
description:
Web App Development: Online Taxi Booking System  

Overview
We need a simple yet efficient Web App for a small taxi business, allowing passengers to book trips online seamlessly. The application should provide a user-friendly interface for customers to enter trip details, calculate fares, make payments, and enable admins to manage bookings efficiently.



Core Features & Functionality

1. Customer Booking Form  
Customers should be able to enter the following details:  
- Customer Name  
- Customer mobile number
- Pick-up Address (Google Maps integration for accurate input & auto-complete)  
- Drop-off Address (Google Maps integration for accurate input & auto-complete)  
- Number of Passengers
- Add Stop/Multiple Destinations Option (if required)  
- Date & Time Selection:
  - Book Now (immediate trip request)  
  - Schedule for Later (calendar-based date & time selection)  

2. Fare Calculation & Payment Processing  
- The system will calculate the trip fare based on a formula that we will provide later.  
- Customers proceed with payment, which will be held in escrow (or any better alternative recommended by the developer).  

3. Booking Approval Process (Admin Panel)  
- Admin receives a notification for each booking request.  
- Admin can Accept or Reject the booking.  
- If Rejected: Payment is automatically refunded, and the customer is notified with the reason (e.g., "No driver available").  
- If Accepted:  
  - Admin is prompted to assign the ride to a driver from a predefined driver list.  
  - Customer receives booking confirmation text with driver details  

4. Ride Completion & Cancellation Handling
- Once a ride is accepted, admin is prompted with:  
  - End Ride (indicating the trip was successfully completed).  
  - Ride Cancelled (if a cancellation occurs).  
- If the ride is cancelled after being accepted, the payment is refunded back to the customer automatically.  

5. Driver Management (Admin Panel)  
- Ability to maintain a list of drivers in the system.  
- Assign drivers to accepted rides.  
- Show assigned driver details to customers upon booking confirmation.  



Technical Considerations
- Google Maps API for location inputs and fare estimation.  
- Escrow-based payment solution (or developer‚Äôs recommendation for an alternative secure transaction system).  
- Admin Panel for managing bookings and drivers.  
- Responsive UI (desktop & mobile-friendly). We can provide this if needed.
- Scalability for future mobile app development (Android & iOS).  

We look forward to a long-term collaboration for future improvements and eventually mobile app development.  Looking forward to working with the right developer to help grow our small passenger transport business! üôè
skills: ['Web Application', 'C#', 'JavaScript', 'PHP', 'Python', 'Square', 'Web Development', 'Haskell', 'Java', 'Payment Gateway Integration']

title: Develop AI Bots for a Poker Game (Unity, C#)
description:
Project Description:
I am looking for an experienced Unity developer proficient in C# to enhance the AI of bots in my Texas Hold'em poker game. The game is already developed, but the bots do not perform automatic actions, and their decision-making system needs improvement. Additionally, turn management should be improved to ensure smooth gameplay.

Main Tasks:

Fix Basic Issues

Ensure turns pass correctly between players.

Update tblBetAmt so that it updates correctly after every bet.

Verify that isBot is correctly assigned to bots in the game.

Enhance AI System for Bots

Make bots perform actions (Check, Call, Raise, Fold) based on board state and hand strength.

Implement a probability-based decision-making system (e.g., bluffing mechanics).

Add timers for bots to simulate human behavior.

Implement Full Hand Ranking System

Develop a system to detect the strongest hands (Straight, Flush, Full House, etc.).

Compare hands to determine the winner at the end of each round (Showdown).

Handle tie cases (Split Pot).

Manage Side Pots for All-in Scenarios

Handle multiple side pots based on players' bet amounts.

Distribute winnings correctly according to Texas Hold'em rules.

Improve User Experience (UX) & Animations

Display real-time game notifications ("Player X went All-in!").

Add animations for bot actions.

Improve the display of the winning hand with explanations.

Bug Fixes & Testing

Conduct comprehensive logic testing to ensure smooth gameplay.

Optimize code performance to prevent lag or freezing.

Requirements:

Strong experience in Unity and C#.

Prior experience with card games or AI systems is a plus.

Ability to modify existing code without changing the project structure.

Availability for communication and code sharing via Git or Unity Collaborate.

Project Details:

Platform: Unity 2019.4+ (Android)

Tech Stack: C#, Unity Engine

Payment: Hourly rate or fixed price per project stage

How to Apply?
Please submit your bid along with examples of similar projects you have worked on. Mention any relevant experience in poker games or turn-based systems.

Thank you and good luck!
skills: ['C#', 'Game Development', 'MySQL', 'iOS', 'Unity', 'Android']

title: Website and Mobile App with Audio Capability Needed
description:
I would like to build out a website and a mobile app (iOS and Android) that work together, hand in hand.

They will share the same database.

I want to create a website and mobile app which will teach people the Qaidah (A book which teaches them the basics of learning Arabic and the Quran).

I want this website/app to have recording and listening capabilities.

Here is how it works...

The user registers an account and is then presented with words and lessons.

He will be able to make a recording of his pronunciation for each word. That whole lesson will be saved and sent to me for correction. I will then be able to record my response in one file and send it back to him.

The user would record the words for every lesson, and the website would keep a record of their recordings, until I can come and check their recordings and then provide them some feedback (by audio file also).

This would be a membership site where I would need to charge people for my time for listening and correcting them. 

It would need a membership script where people can register an account and log in and continue their lessons.

Their own account will contain their own recordings and my responses.

The account area will display lessons in order, and they can progress from one lesson to the  
next.

I may even employ teachers who can listen to the recordings, and so the website/app has to have the ability to accommodate this.

There has to be a good way for them to record one word at a time, next to each of the words that I give them. So the layout has to be good.

Then the site should allow me to create responses next to that word too, both text and audio.

The layout of each lesson should be nice to look at.

Only when I click a button can they move on to the next lesson.

To avoid clogging the database with thousands of recordings, they should all be purged 10 days  
after they have been first listened to.

The same functionality that is on the website (for the user), it should also be on the mobile app.

My full requirements are written on Trello.

You can see it here: https://trello.com/b/cw5IFlI7/quran-pilot

Just read each card one at a time, in order.

Let me know how much it would cost me and how long it would take, if you are able to do it.

Let me know your lowest cost.

webkept
skills: ['C#', 'JavaScript', 'PHP', 'iOS', 'Python', 'Web Development', 'Mobile App Development', 'Haskell', 'Java', 'Android']

title: Work on Existing Java/Kotlin Android App using Team Viewer
description:
Project Details



We are seeking a freelancer to work on an Android app for schools and colleges. The app consists of multiple modules and is available on the Google Play Store in two versions: one for teachers/faculty and another for students/parents.



Scope of Work



As a freelancer, you will be required to:



1. Resolve issues with Push Notifications:

  - Fix errors in the existing code or library.

  - Implement notifications for the following modules:

    - Teacher App: Notice Board, Mail Box, Exam Marks, Co-Scholastics, Exam-Attendance, and Remarks.

    - Student App: Class Work, Home Work, Mail Box, Notice Board, Exam Schedule, and Exam Result.

2. Resolve issues with Aadhar Card Notification/Update:

  - Fix errors in the existing code or library.

  - Implement the Aadhar pop-up notification as per the specified logic.

3. Develop the Student Fees Payment module:

  - Create a new module for online fee payment using a payment gateway.

  - Implement the following features:

    - Payment for single or multiple fees.

    - Display of pending and paid fee structures.

    - Option for parents to download and save money receipts.



Technical Requirements



- The project will be developed using Kotlin, MySQL, and PHP 5.6.

- The freelancer will work on our laptop using Team Viewer.

title: Glide App Developer Needed for Construction Punch List Tracking App
description:
Job Overview:
I am developing a mobile app using Glide to track and document punch list items for construction projects. I have already started the project but have hit my capacity, so I am looking for an experienced Glide App developer to help bring it to the finish line.

This app will allow multiple types of users to create, manage, and track punch list items, ensuring quality work is completed before project closeout. The app will include photo/video documentation, user role-based permissions, status updates, reporting, and PDF export features.

I need a Glide expert who understands app development using relational databases, user permissions, file storage, and structured workflows.



***Project Scope & Key Requirements***
User Roles & Permissions:
- Admins ‚Äì Manage all projects, oversee construction phases, assign users, and have the exclusive ability to delete projects and users.
- Construction Managers ‚Äì Create projects, rooms, and punch list items; update item statuses with required photo/video documentation.
- Design Managers ‚Äì Create punch list items but cannot update statuses.
- Clients ‚Äì Temporary access (1-week) to add punch list items to an assigned project; cannot edit after submission.

Project & Room Structure:
- Projects contain multiple rooms.
- Each room can have multiple punch list items.

Punch List Item Workflow:
- Users create items by selecting project ‚Üí room ‚Üí "Add Item" button.
- Form entry includes Title, Description, and at least 1 Photo or Video (required).
- Default status on creation = OPEN.
- Each item includes date stamps for tracking updates.

Status Management & Updates:
- 4 Statuses: Open, In Progress, Needs Meeting, Completed.
- Construction Managers/Admins can update statuses via a dropdown.
- Each update requires at least one new photo or video for documentation.
- Status updates are recorded with timestamps for reporting.

Admin-Specific Privileges:
- Only Admins can delete projects and users.
- Admins can assign Design Managers to specific projects.
- Admins can create and assign Client users with a countdown timer for access expiration.

User Interface & Reporting:
- Users need a dashboard summary displaying all items by status.
- Ability to filter items based on project, room, or status.
- At project completion, export a PDF report with:
         - Project Address
         - All completed items
         - Initial and updated status photos/videos
         - Final completion status with timestamp

What I Need From You:
- Glide App development expertise (experience with complex relational data structures).
- Ability to structure and optimize data tables for performance (e.g., managing multiple photos/videos per item).
- Experience implementing conditional user permissions and filtering views.
- Knowledge of PDF report generation and email automation within Glide.
- Ability to implement Admin-only deletion controls for projects and users.
- Problem-solving skills to refine existing workflows where needed.

Project Deliverables:
- Fully functional Glide app with all user roles, permissions, and workflows.
- Status-based filtering system for easy navigation of punch list items.
- Proper data structure for storing multiple photos/videos per item.
- PDF report generation and email functionality.
- Admin-only controls for deleting projects and users.
- Testing & debugging to ensure a smooth user experience.



***How to Apply***
Please include:
- Your experience with Glide Apps and similar mobile development projects.
- Examples of database-heavy Glide apps you have built.
- Your estimated timeframe for completing this project.

Looking forward to collaborating with a skilled developer to finalize this app!

title: Flutter Developer Needed for Dynamic Homescreen Widget for Streak Display
description:
I am seeking a developer with expertise in native Android and iOS development to create a streak widget for my Flutter-based math application. The widget should closely resemble Duolingo's streak widget in functionality and design.

Key Requirements:

1. Integration with Flutter:

The project is part of a Flutter application.

The background for the home screen widget will be determined in the Flutter code.

Relevant variables (e.g., whether the user has completed their daily lesson) will be supplied, but the backgrounds will not be fetched from the backend.



2. Widget Design & Components:

The widget should include:

A widget background (stored on the frontend).

A streak icon.

Streak text displaying the number of consecutive days (e.g., 1, 2, 3, etc.).


I will provide all widget backgrounds, as well as an example image to illustrate the desired design, including the exact positioning of the streak text, streak icons, and other elements.



3. Dynamic Backgrounds and Icons:

Backgrounds: There will be multiple options for widget backgrounds:

If the user has not completed their daily lesson, the widget should randomly select from five options designated for this state. (I have attached example layouts)

If the user has completed their daily lesson, the widget should randomly select from five different options.


Streak Icon: The streak icon should dynamically change based on whether the user has completed their daily lesson.



4. Conditional Updates:

The streak text color (e.g., 1, 2, 3) should be gray if the user has not completed their daily lesson.

Both the streak icon and the widget background should reflect the completion status of the daily lesson.



5. Live Updates:

The widget must support real-time updates to ensure it reflects changes immediately after a user completes a lesson.

This could involve implementing a listener or similar mechanism to synchronize the widget state dynamically.



6. Confidentiality:

As part of this project, you will be required to sign a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) to ensure confidentiality and the protection of intellectual property.




If you are interested and meet these requirements, please reach out. I will provide the necessary resources, including widget backgrounds, example images, and backend variables for the project.



Requirements:  
- Fetch streak and lesson completion status dynamically from the backend whenever the homescreen is opened or updated.  
- The widget should work seamlessly for both iOS and Android platforms.  
- Use any Flutter package necessary to implement the functionality efficiently.  
- Fix Directory Issues: Resolve missing or broken folders in my Android and iOS directories to ensure compatibility with the existing project.  
- Platform Detection: Ensure the app can dynamically detect whether the user is on iOS or Android and use the appropriate native implementation.
Make any necessary changes on the Flutter side to guarantee compatibility and proper integration with platform-specific features.
- Code Responsibility: You will be responsible for making the necessary changes to the Flutter codebase to ensure seamless functionality of the widget.

Deliverables:  
1. Fully functional widget code for both iOS and Android platforms.  
2. Ensure dynamic fetching and updates of streak and lesson completion data.  
3. Fix any issues with my current Android and iOS project directories.  
4. Provide all source code files and ensure compatibility with my existing project.
5. Make the n

Additional Requirements:  
- NDA: You must sign a Non-Disclosure Agreement before starting the project.  
- Code Ownership: Upon completion and payment, the code will become my property, and you must destroy any copies.  
- Fixed Price: Provide a fixed price for the project.  
- Confidentiality: You are not allowed to share the code or any details of this project with others.  

Preferences:  
- Experience with creating homescreen widgets for Flutter.  
- Strong debugging skills to resolve directory and compatibility issues.  

If you are interested, please share:  
1. Examples of similar work you have done in Flutter.  
2. Your fixed price quote for the project.

title: Automated Airbnb Management System Development
description:
Request for Proposal (RFP) ‚Äì Automated Airbnb Management System Development
Project Title: Development of an Automated Airbnb Management System with ChatGPT Integration

Introduction
I am seeking experienced developers (individuals or teams) to build a comprehensive Airbnb Management System that will:

‚úÖ Automate guest communication via ChatGPT.
‚úÖ Assign cleaning and maintenance tasks automatically.
‚úÖ Manage breakfast (donut/bagel) deliveries based on guest preferences.
‚úÖ Provide a web-based dashboard for desktop users (via Chrome, Edge, and Safari).
‚úÖ Provide mobile apps for iOS/Android phones & tablets for crew task management and photo uploads.
‚úÖ Automate routine Airbnb operational tasks to improve guest satisfaction and increase 5-star reviews.

The solution must be modular to allow future feature upgrades. The developer will be required to sign a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) before starting the project.

Project Goals & Key Features
The app must include the following features:

1. Airbnb Data Extraction Module
Objective: Extract guest messages, booking details, and reservation data from Airbnb.

‚úÖ Use one of the following methods:

Airbnb API (preferred if access is available).
Email Parsing (via IMAP/Gmail/Outlook ‚Äì preferred for reliability).
Web Scraping (as a backup method if other options fail).
‚úÖ Extract details such as:

Guest name
Check-in/Check-out dates
Special requests
Guest inquiries
‚úÖ Data will be securely stored in a structured database for ChatGPT to access.

2. ChatGPT-Powered Messaging & Task Automation Module
Objective: Automate guest communication and crew task creation using ChatGPT.

‚úÖ Automatically respond to common guest questions (e.g., check-in instructions, WiFi details).
‚úÖ Assign cleaning and maintenance tasks based on:

Booking details (e.g., check-out time triggers cleaning task).
Guest-reported issues (e.g., plumbing leak triggers handyman task).
‚úÖ Manage urgent issues by alerting the host directly.
‚úÖ Handle back-to-back bookings by auto-scheduling additional cleaners when required.
3. Cleaner‚Äôs App (iOS/Android)
Objective: Provide a mobile app for cleaners to manage cleaning schedules and upload proof-of-cleaning photos.

‚úÖ Features:

Display assigned cleaning schedules.
Auto-notify cleaners about urgent or back-to-back cleaning needs.
Require cleaners to upload photos of completed cleaning as proof.
Alert the host when the task is completed.
4. Maintenance Crew App (iOS/Android)
Objective: Provide maintenance teams with an app for task management and proof-of-repair uploads.

‚úÖ Features:

Display assigned maintenance schedules.
Auto-notify the crew about urgent issues.
Require the crew to upload proof-of-repair photos.
Alert the host when the task is completed.
5. Donut/Bagel Delivery Automation
Objective: Automate breakfast delivery scheduling based on guest preferences.

‚úÖ After booking confirmation, ChatGPT will message the guest:

"Would you prefer bagels or donuts, and what time would you like them delivered?"

‚úÖ Schedule orders for delivery at the guest's preferred time.
‚úÖ Integrate with:

Local bagel/donut shop (API integration if available).
Uber Eats, DoorDash, or Instacart API if no direct API is available.
‚úÖ Send guests a confirmation message when the order is placed and when it arrives.
6. Host Alert & Payment Management System
Objective: Provide a secure system for tracking completed tasks and generating payments for crew members.

‚úÖ Alert the host when cleaning or maintenance tasks are marked complete.
‚úÖ Display uploaded proof-of-completion photos for review.
‚úÖ Generate payment requests for completed tasks.
‚úÖ Provide the host with a one-click payment approval system.
‚úÖ Integrate with Zelle API (or manual approval) for payouts.

7. Web Dashboard (For Desktop Users)
Objective: Provide a powerful web interface for managing bookings, messages, and tasks.

‚úÖ Accessible via Chrome, Edge, and Safari.
‚úÖ Features include:

Guest communication via ChatGPT-generated responses.
Calendar view of cleaning & maintenance schedules.
Dashboard to review proof-of-completion photos.
Payment approval and financial tracking.
8. Common Airbnb Operational Automations
Objective: Automate common tasks to ensure smooth operation.

‚úÖ Automatically send:

Check-in instructions the day before arrival.
Check-out reminders on departure day.
Follow-up review requests to encourage 5-star reviews.

title: Chatroom Connectivity Issue
description:
I have a web application with a chat functionality that's experiencing connection issues. The chat interface shows conflicting connection information that needs to be fixed.
Current behavior:

The chat interface shows "Connection Status: Connecting" with a yellow/orange indicator
The server status shows as "Server Online" (in green text)
All diagnostic checks pass successfully:

Server is running and responding to requests ‚úÖ
Socket.io endpoint is available and working ‚úÖ
Socket.io handshake successful (with a valid Session ID) ‚úÖ


Despite these successful checks, the UI displays "Not connected to chat server" in the middle of the chat window
The bottom of the interface shows "Connection unavailable" and the Send button appears disabled

Technical details:

The application uses Socket.io for WebSocket connections
The interface includes diagnostic tools and connection options
Appears to be a frontend issue where the connection state isn't properly synchronized with the UI

Required skills:

Experience with Socket.io and WebSocket connections
JavaScript/frontend development
UI state management
Network debugging

Looking for a developer who can diagnose and fix this connection inconsistency so that successful socket connections are properly reflected in the UI, allowing users to send messages.

title: Mobile App Developer for Android & iOS - Bluetooth Integration
description:
We are looking for an experienced mobile app developer for both Android and iOS operating systems that can develop a sample application and pre-compiled library for communicating with a custom Bluetooth Low Energy device. The application should use the native Bluetooth features on both operating systems and be compatible with all versions of each operating system currently in circulation. We will provide full documentation of the Bluetooth services and characteristics for the custom device. The application must include a single screen with a button that initiates a BLE connection to the device, subscribes to certain characteristics, and sends pre-defined commands to other characteristics. The pre-compiled library must allow third party applications that import the library to call a minimal number of class methods to do the same. Further details will be provided upon job acceptance. An ideal candidate will be able to complete this project for both Android and iOS, but exceptional candidates that specialize in a single operating system will also be considered.

Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Develop an iOS SDK using CoreBluetooth in Swift to handle BLE connectivity to the custom device.
‚Ä¢ Develop an Android SDK using Android's Bluetooth LE API in Kotlin to handle BLE connectivity to the custom device.
‚Ä¢ Create a sample iOS application in Swift that showcases the integration of the iOS SDK.
‚Ä¢ Create a sample Android application in Kotlin that demonstrates the Android SDK.
‚Ä¢ Implement BLE protocols to manage device advertisement, connection, bonding, and data exchange.
‚Ä¢ Ensure proper handling of BLE commands, responses, and notifications based on the device's specifications.
‚Ä¢ Produce comprehensive documentation for both SDKs, including setup, integration guidelines, and troubleshooting.

Deliverables:
1. iOS SDK: A pre-compiled SDK utilizing CoreBluetooth in Swift for robust BLE communication.
2. Sample iOS Application: A fully functional iOS app in Swift that demonstrates the use of the iOS SDK.
3. Android SDK: A pre-compiled SDK utilizing Android's Bluetooth LE API in Kotlin to ensure seamless BLE interactions.
4. Sample Android Application: A fully functional Android app in Kotlin showcasing the integration of the Android SDK.
5. Documentation: Describing how to integrate the SDKs into existing mobile applications and how to use the sample applications.

Technical Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in developing native mobile applications for both iOS and Android.
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of BLE protocols and hands-on experience with CoreBluetooth for iOS and Android's Bluetooth LE API.
‚Ä¢ Swift for iOS development and Kotlin for Android development.
‚Ä¢ Ability to produce clear, developer-friendly documentation for SDK integration and sample app usage.

title: Basketball GM Simulator Game
description:
Job Title:

Basketball GM Life Simulator ‚Äì Game Developer Needed (Mobile & PC)

Job Description:

I am looking for a game developer to help create a basketball general manager simulation game, inspired by BitLife and other life simulation games. The game will allow players to start as a GM, make strategic decisions, and build a championship team while navigating contracts, trades, drafts, and team chemistry.

This is a turn-based, text-driven simulation with dynamic storylines, realistic player demands, and deep decision-making elements. The goal is to provide an immersive GM experience that feels as close to real basketball operations as possible.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Develop a turn-based text simulation game with a clean UI and engaging mechanics
‚Ä¢ Implement features like drafting, trades, player negotiations, scouting, and team-building
‚Ä¢ Create randomized story events and AI-driven player reactions (e.g., trade demands, retirements, injuries)
‚Ä¢ Design an algorithm for player progression, contract negotiations, and realistic team performance
‚Ä¢ Optimize for mobile (iOS/Android) and potentially PC
‚Ä¢ Integrate database-driven player stats and career progression
‚Ä¢ Ensure auto-save functionality and deep customization options

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in game development (Unity, Godot, or other suitable engines for simulation games)
‚Ä¢ Experience with text-based or simulation games (e.g., sports sims, idle managers, or life simulators)
‚Ä¢ Strong AI and logic programming for trade decisions, contract negotiations, and team performance
‚Ä¢ Backend/database knowledge (storing player career data, stats, and progression over multiple seasons)
‚Ä¢ UI/UX skills for a sleek, text-heavy, easy-to-navigate interface
‚Ä¢ Passion for basketball and knowledge of GM mechanics (preferred but not required)

Bonus Skills (Not Required but Helpful):
‚Ä¢ Experience with BitLife-style event scripting and randomization
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of NBA-style salary cap, trades, and team-building
‚Ä¢ Ability to implement online multiplayer or leaderboard features

If you‚Äôre interested, please provide:
1. Relevant game development experience (especially text-based simulations or sports managers)
2. Portfolio or links to past projects
3. Estimated timeline and budget for an MVP version

Looking forward to working with a talented developer to bring this vision to life!

description:

behyve is an exclusive, cutting-edge booking platform redefining lifestyle and wellness bookings through trusted recommendations. We connect users with vetted, high-quality professionals‚Äîfrom yoga teachers and fitness coaches to private chefs‚Äîbased on authentic recommendations from their close circle of friends (‚Äòhyves‚Äô).

title: Senior Mobile QA Automation Engineer (Appium / Java)
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled QA Automation Engineer with Appium and Java expertise to develop, maintain, and scale our mobile automation framework. The project involves creating robust test scripts, managing multiple device instances, and ensuring accurate, high-volume testing for advanced features‚Äîspanning complex login flows, content management, and secure interactions. You will audit our existing codebase, address gaps left by a previous engineer, and help push our automation suite to handle large-scale concurrency without sacrificing reliability.


Responsibilities
1. Test Automation Architecture & Maintenance
‚Ä¢ Take ownership of our existing Appium/Java framework, reviewing code, fixing issues, and refactoring for better performance and maintainability.
‚Ä¢ Build new automated scripts and test scenarios that handle advanced user flows (e.g., login, media uploads, content interactions, etc.).
‚Ä¢ Implement best practices for scalability, ensuring tests can run reliably across multiple devices or emulators.
2. Device & Environment Management
‚Ä¢ Oversee mobile device farms or emulators (Android focus) to run parallel tests at scale.
‚Ä¢ Manage capabilities and configurations (ADB, proxies, network settings) to optimize automation reliability and reduce detection or blocking issues.
3. Test Coverage & Scenario Planning
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with the product team to identify critical test cases, corner cases, and user journeys.
‚Ä¢ Develop strategies for regression testing, performance testing, and edge-case coverage.
4. Continuous Integration & Reporting
‚Ä¢ Integrate automated tests within a CI/CD pipeline (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI).
‚Ä¢ Provide detailed test reports (logs, screenshots, or videos) to highlight failures, track coverage, and guide fixes.
5. Framework Enhancements & Best Practices
‚Ä¢ Suggest and implement improvements to the automation architecture (e.g., Page Object Model, BDD, data-driven tests).
‚Ä¢ Ensure robust handling of dynamic UI elements, timeouts, and synchronization for stable test runs.
6. Collaboration & Knowledge Transfer
‚Ä¢ Work closely with developers, PMs, and other QA engineers to clarify requirements and triage issues.
‚Ä¢ Document the automation framework thoroughly, guiding team members on test execution and maintenance.

Required Skills & Qualifications
1. Strong Appium & Java Expertise
‚Ä¢ 2+ years dedicated experience in Appium with Java.
‚Ä¢ Familiar with Android test automation (ADB commands, emulator/device management).
2. Mobile Test Automation
‚Ä¢ Proven track record creating or maintaining automation frameworks for mobile apps.
‚Ä¢ Experience handling large-scale or complex test scenarios (multiple user accounts, concurrency, etc.).
3. CI/CD & Version Control
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with continuous integration (Jenkins, GitLab, or similar) and version control workflows (GitHub, GitLab).
‚Ä¢ Ability to set up test pipelines, environment variables, and triggers for automated builds.
4. Debugging & Reporting
‚Ä¢ Strong debugging skills, investigating failing tests, diagnosing UI flakiness or environment issues.
‚Ä¢ Comfortable generating and interpreting logs/snapshots for quick resolution.
5. Agile Mindset & Communication
‚Ä¢ Team player who can communicate effectively with developers and stakeholders.
‚Ä¢ Open to iterative feedback, daily standups or sprint reviews.
6. Bonus / Nice-to-Have
‚Ä¢ iOS automation experience (XCUITest)
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of API testing (Postman, RestAssured)
‚Ä¢ Proxy / Advanced Networking for more complex automation environments
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with test management tools (TestRail, Zephyr)

Project Scope & Timeline
1. Phase 1: Audit & Stabilize
‚Ä¢ Review existing scripts, fix major issues.
‚Ä¢ Establish robust baseline tests (login, core features) with stable pass rates.
2. Phase 2: Expand Coverage
‚Ä¢ Add test scenarios for advanced features, concurrency, or specialized user flows.
‚Ä¢ Integrate fully with CI/CD (Jenkins or similar) to generate nightly or on-demand runs.
3. Phase 3: Scale & Optimize
‚Ä¢ Leverage device farms or additional emulators to run tests in parallel.
‚Ä¢ Fine-tune performance, reduce flakiness, and ensure consistent test outcomes.
We are open to both hourly or milestone-based engagements, depending on experience and proposed approach. You will coordinate with our internal dev team (or other QAs) via Slack/Jira/GitHub for tickets, code reviews, and overall project tracking.
skills: ['Python', 'Selenium', 'Automated Testing', 'Performance Testing', 'Java', 'Load Testing', 'Test Results & Analysis', 'BrowserStack', 'Bug Tracking & Reports', 'Android Debug Bridge', 'Appium', 'Software QA', 'Manual Testing', 'Web Testing', 'API Testing', 'Mobile App Testing']

Chiventis is a digital vending platform that allows users to purchase airtime, data, electricity tokens, and cable TV subscriptions in Nigeria. The Android version is fully functional, and we need an iOS version to provide the same features to iPhone users.

Scope of Work:
Develop the iOS version of the Chiventis app using Flutter
Ensure seamless backend integration with our existing APIs (for transactions, user authentication, payments, etc.)

Firebase (Authentication, Firestore, Cloud Messaging, Analytics)

Git & Version Control (All work must be hosted and submitted and be made available on Github on our repo)
Push Notifications ‚Äì APNs & Firebase Cloud Messaging setup for iOS

title: Mobile app development
description:
We are seeking an experienced mobile app developer (or development team) to build a cross-platform mobile application using Vue.js integrated with Ionic Framework, targeting both iOS and Android platforms, with a planned launch this summer. The app will serve as an extension of our existing platform and must integrate seamlessly with our website and MySQL database via a RESTful API (developed in-house).

Project Scope & Key Features:

User Registration & Authentication:
Implement sign-up and login functionalities using our existing system (email/username + password) to ensure a unified experience between the website and mobile app.

Real-Time One-on-One Chat:
Develop a secure chat feature for direct communication between users and therapists. The chat should leverage WebSockets combined with AWS Lambda for real-time interactions, while chat sessions and messages are stored in AWS RDS.

Push Notifications:
Integrate push notifications for new chat messages and scheduled reminders, ensuring users remain engaged even when not actively using the app.

Diary Functionality:
Enable users to create, edit, and sync diary entries directly from the app. All entries will be stored in the MySQL database via our API.

Guided Exercises via WebView:
Display existing therapeutic exercises through an in-app WebView, utilizing our current responsive web pages to save on development time.

Resource Library & Search:
Provide access to a searchable library of cached texts. While the library content can be cached on the device, synchronization with the server is essential to keep data up-to-date.

Technical Requirements:

Framework & Tools:

Develop the mobile app using Vue.js integrated with Ionic Framework.
Leverage Ionic‚Äôs tools and Capacitor to package and deploy a single codebase as native apps on both iOS and Android.
API Integration:

Consume RESTful API endpoints (authentication, diary, library content) developed by our internal team.
Real-Time Communication & Cloud Integration:

Implement a real-time chat system using AWS Lambda, API Gateway (WebSockets), and AWS RDS.
Integrate push notifications using services like Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) for Android and Apple Push Notification service (APNs) for iOS.

title: Software Developer Needed for Mobile and Web App Functionality
description:
**Job Description:**

We are looking for a motivated software developer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and implementing a specific functionality that will be seamlessly integrated into both our mobile and web applications. This new feature is crucial for enhancing user experience and ensuring that our applications meet the evolving needs of our customers.

**Functionality**
The user should be accessing the functionality without specific login forms or other authentication means. The feature should be part of the app, both visually and as an experience.
Upon opening the app section denominated *Community* the user should be presented with a list of contents (i.e. articles) coming from a database. These articles should by default be presented in a chronological order, from the newest to the oldest.
The list should include a small image, the title and a brief text excerpt from the article itself
The user should be able to search articles, through a standard search feature, as well as filtering. Common filters are expected (date, tags, views, interactions etc).
The user should be able to click on one article and open the entire article in a dedicated view.
At the bottom of the article a section should be present to allow for comments and reaction on the article itself. The user should be able to post comments, interact with other comments and post reactions. The user should be identified in the comments section using the profile information of the parent app.

**Development**
During the development phase of the feature it is expected from the developer to maintain a reasonable communication with the engineering team of the commissioner. This will include updates on the development and check ins for validation with the QA responsible. These information rounds will ideally happen every 48hrs, but shorter cycles are also welcome.
The feature will be considered complete when it meets the aforementioned requirements and can be presented in working conditions.

title: Mobile App Developer (Flutter) for Children‚Äôs Interactive Story App with In-App Purchases
description:
Job Description:
Hello!

We are looking for an experienced Flutter developer to build a delightful, interactive children's story app called "kids.love.science". This app will showcase illustrated digital books designed to inspire curiosity and learning in kids, using JPEG images, audio narration, subtitles, and engaging reading experiences.

The app itself will be free to download, but individual stories (books) will be sold via native in-app purchases (IAP) through Apple‚Äôs App Store and Google Play Store.

Important:
Due to Apple Store guidelines, the app will include static book listings bundled with the app. Actual content (book pages and narration audio) will be downloaded dynamically from our secure backend (Firebase) when a user makes a purchase. Purchased books will start playing immediately, downloading the remaining content seamlessly in the background.

Main Features of the App:
Digital Bookshelf: List of static book titles, covers, descriptions, and ratings.
Book Purchase and Preview: Integrated In-App Purchases (StoreKit & Google Billing).
Dynamic Download: Immediate playback with progressive background downloading.
Interactive Reading Experience:
Landscape mode (audio narration focus)
Portrait mode (half-text, half-image)
Narration toggle, page-swiping, adjustable font sizes, brightness, and volume controls.
User-Friendly Settings: Languages, subtitles, parental controls, purchase restoration.
Push Notifications (Firebase Cloud Messaging) and Analytics (Firebase Analytics).
Technical Requirements:
Flutter for cross-platform development (iOS and Android)
Backend integration using Firebase (Cloud Storage, Hosting, Cloud Messaging, Analytics)
Experience integrating Apple StoreKit and Google Play Billing Library for IAP
Version control via Git (GitHub preferred)
Experience setting up CI/CD (Codemagic or Bitrise) is a bonus
Familiarity with JSON data handling and optimized media assets (JPEG, MP3/AAC audio)
Ideal Candidate Should Have:
Proven experience with Flutter (please provide links to apps you've developed)
Experience with Firebase backend services (hosting, storage, authentication, analytics)
Proven ability to integrate native payment gateways (StoreKit & Google Billing)
Understanding of mobile UI/UX best practices, specifically for kids and parents
Strong communication skills and the ability to work independently
Problem-solving mindset and proactive attitude toward potential challenges
What We Will Provide:
Complete UI/UX designs in Figma (collaboration with a UX/UI designer)
High-quality, professionally illustrated JPEG images for each book
Professionally recorded audio narration and subtitles
Clear project documentation and prompt communication throughout the project
Budget and Timeline:
Please propose your fixed-price offer based on the described scope.
Estimated timeline: approximately 6‚Äì8 weeks (negotiable based on your input).
Application Instructions:
Please include the following in your proposal:

Your experience with Flutter apps (especially involving IAP).
Links to relevant apps you've developed (App Store/Google Play).
Your experience with Firebase integration.
An approximate timeline and cost estimate based on your understanding of this job.
Any clarifications or initial suggestions you might have for this project.
We're excited about this project and look forward to building a strong, collaborative relationship!
http://kids.love.science

title: Mobile App Specialist Needed for iOS and Android
description:
We are seeking a skilled mobile app expert to address and resolve security vulnerabilities in our Android and iOS applications. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in fixing the issues below.
Here are the exact issues you will have to address, not all may need code change. We'll also tell you how to fix these issues. I need someone to actually fix these.

APK-01: Janus Vulnerability
APK-02: Token Found in XML File (File System Storage)
APK-03: Sensitive Data in Logs (Token Present)
APK-04: Sensitive Data in URLs (Token Visible in Auto-Login)
APK-05: Improper Session Expiration (No Session Expiration)
APK-06: Token Replay Attacks Possible (Token Can Be Replayed)
APK-07: Missing HttpOnly Flag (Cookies Accessible via JavaScript)
APK-08: SameSite=None on Cookies (Potential CSRF Risk)
Private and Confidential: Limited Circulation

APK-09: No Root/Jailbreak Detection (Device Not Protected Against
Rooting/Jailbreaking
APK-10: App Can Be Installed on Vulnerable, Unpatched Android Versions
APK-11: Backup Issues Identified (Backup is Enabled)
APK-12: Insecure Hashing Algorithm MD5 Used
APK-13: Insecure Hashing Algorithm SHA-1 Used
APK-14: Message Authentication Code (MAC) is Configured with HmacMD5
APK-15: Unvalidated URL Opening (android.intent.action.VIEW)
APK-16: Insecure CALL_PHONE Permission
APK-17: Application Does Not Check for Updates
IPA-01: Insecure Cookie Storage
IPA-02: Insecure API Usage (_fopen, _memcpy, _printf, _sscanf)
IPA-03: Binary Not Encrypted
IPA-04: Missing Frida Detection in iOS Application
IPA-05: Jailbreak Detection Bypass
IPA-06: Runpath Search Path Vulnerability (@rpath)
IPA-07: Debug Symbols Available
IPA-08: Improper Certificate Validation
IPA-09: Exposed Google API Key in Application

title: Media Compression Fix - Mobile Dev
description:
Technical Issue Description:
Our mobile application (available on both iOS and Android) is experiencing intermittent crashes when users attempt to upload media files larger than 10MB. The crash occurs specifically during the compression process before upload begins. Our analytics show this affects approximately 8% of our user base, primarily on devices running iOS 16+ and Android 11+.
The issue appears to be related to memory management during the compression algorithm execution. The app successfully handles smaller files but fails to properly allocate resources for larger media. Debug logs show "OutOfMemoryError" exceptions on Android and "Memory Warning" followed by termination on iOS.

Requirements:

Strong experience with both iOS (Swift) and Android (Kotlin) development
Expertise in media handling, compression algorithms, and memory optimization
Familiarity with troubleshooting crash reports and performance issues
Ability to quickly navigate unfamiliar codebases
Experience implementing cross-platform solutions

Responsibilities:

Review existing compression implementation and identify the root cause
Develop and implement an optimized solution that works across both platforms
Test the fix across multiple device configurations
Document the changes made and provide recommendations for future improvements
Submit working code with proper comments by end of day

title: Android Developer for Wallpaper App Development
description:
We are seeking an experienced Android developer to create a wallpaper-related application. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio showcasing previous work in wallpaper apps and demonstrate proficiency in coding, design, and user experience.

In Android 12 and later, changing the wallpaper using WallpaperManager.setBitmap() or similar methods triggers a system-wide configuration change, causing the app's activity to restart. This happens because Material You theming updates the system's color palette dynamically based on the wallpaper.

Problem:
If your app sets a wallpaper, the current activity is destroyed and recreated, leading to potential loss of UI state, unexpected reloads, or performance issues.

Question:
How would you implement a solution that allows setting a new wallpaper without triggering an activity restart or disrupting the user experience?

description:
Need a Java Android developer with experience in working with React Native bridges and custom native modules.

We have a live RN mobile app that has 2 buggs.

Another developer investigated the bugs and found that they are caused by the SelectableText component, which is exported from the outdated react-native-selectable-text library. This library is no longer maintained and relies on a custom Java component instead of native React Native components.

Since he has no experience with Java he can't fix the issues caused by this library.

The issues are the following:

1. the app crashes when you tap and hold in the content/text sections

2. you can only highlight one word at a time in the content sections. Cannot drag the cursors to select more words.
Users can see the beginning and end of the word highlighting but can‚Äôt move the cursors. It disappears.

How long would it take you to fix this?

P.S. Bonus points if you have experience with EXPO.dev as we are considering transferring the project there for easier management. Advice on this would be appreciated

title: Experienced Android developer for comprehensive review of my Application ‚Äì Feedback & Suggestions
description:
Hey devs,

I‚Äôve built an Android app but I am not an android developer by trade, back-end end Java developer. The application works, but I know there‚Äôs plenty of room to write better, cleaner, and more efficient code‚Äîand that‚Äôs where you come in.
What I Need:

I‚Äôm looking for a developer with strong Android/Kotlin expertise to do a deep dive into my code and give actionable feedback on:

    Code Structure & Architecture ‚Äì Is it well-organized? Any refactoring needed?
    Best Practices ‚Äì Am I following MVVM, Jetpack Compose, and other modern patterns correctly?
    Performance Optimization ‚Äì Any inefficiencies that could slow things down?
    Error Handling & Stability ‚Äì Any weak points that might cause crashes or bad user experiences?
    Scalability & Maintainability ‚Äì Would this codebase be easy to expand and maintain long-term?

I don‚Äôt need vague feedback‚ÄîI need specific recommendations. If something can be done in a better way, tell me how. If there are anti-patterns, unnecessary complexity, or missing optimizations, call them out.
Who I‚Äôm Looking For:

    Strong Kotlin & Android experience (Jetpack Compose, MVVM, Coroutines, etc.)
    Someone who‚Äôs worked on real-world production apps and knows what scales well
    Comfortable reviewing someone else‚Äôs code and explaining how to improve it

I‚Äôll provide access to the repo, and ideally, I‚Äôd like a written report or a video walkthrough with your suggestions.

If this sounds like something you can do, drop a message with your experience and how you‚Äôd approach the review. Looking forward to working with you!

title: DJI Cloud APi Developer
description:
We are seeking an experienced Android developer to build an application that leverages the DJI Mobile SDK v5 to enable remote drone control via gRPC. The goal of this project is to create a proxy between gRPC and the DJI Mobile SDK, allowing a server to issue commands‚Äîsuch as take-off, landing, and virtual stick movements‚Äîto the drone in real time.

Project Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Develop an Android application using the DJI Mobile SDK v5.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Implement functionality to control a DJI drone via a bi-directional gRPC channel.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Relay take-off, landing, and virtual stick commands from a remote server to the drone.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Provide realtime video feed back o er grpc to the server.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Integrate gRPC and Protobuf definitions provided for the communication protocol.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Create a user interface that allows the configuration of an IP address/DNS name for the drone to connect to.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Ensure reliable and low-latency communication between the server and the drone.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Collaborate with our team to test and refine the application for optimal performance and stability.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Optionally support gRPC connections over SSL for security.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†There is no need to implement any authentication.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†The commands can be called at any rate from the server. Each command has a TTL of 100ms. Expired commands will move the sticks to the neutral position making the drone hover in place.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†A new command coming in should be executed immediately replacing the current command.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Realtime video from the drone should be sent through the gRPC connection to the server.

Please include the following in your proposal:
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†A brief summary of your relevant experience, specifically highlighting any projects involving DJI SDK or gRPC.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Examples of previous Android applications you have developed.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Your approach and estimated timeline for completing this project.
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Any questions you might have about the project requirements.

P.S: ONLY INDEPENDENT CONTRACTORS, NO AGENCIES. THANK YOU

description:

Hello,
We have developed a Quiz Elite-like Q&A application that helps students practice and learn by answering subject-related questions. Users can create rooms, compete with each other, and collaborate.

However, due to an unfortunate accident involving our previous developer, the project was left incomplete. We are now looking for a talented developer to finish the remaining features.

‚úÖ Single-Player Mode: A system that allows users to play individually.
‚úÖ Live Chat System:

Students should be able to join admin-created rooms and chat live.
The admin panel should allow unlimited room creation, with the ability to open and close rooms at specific times.
Moderation Controls:
Admin should be able to ban disruptive users and assign moderators.
Users should have the ability to block, report, or mute messages from inappropriate or disruptive individuals.
üí° Alternative Solution: The chat system does not necessarily have to be integrated within the app. We have our own server, so we can redirect users to a web-based chat system. A subdomain-based separate system is also an option. I trust your professional approach‚Äîmy priority is a reliable, fast, and seamless solution.

Tech Stack:
Backend: Java Spring Boot, JpaRepository, Spring Security, JWT Security
Frontend: Vue.js
Database: PostgreSQL
üí° You can either develop on top of the existing code or integrate a ready-made solution (e.g., Codecanyon, etc.).

title: Develop a P2P Car Park App for iOS and Android
description:
We are seeking an experienced mobile app developer to create a peer-to-peer car parking application for both iOS and Android platforms.When someone is ready to unpark his car then he will send a notification on the system. The system will then pair this user with another one that seeks for parking on the same location. Then he will send GPS coordinates in order to find the parking spot. The user that seeks for parking will send coins on the user that will wait before unpark. The app should enable users to list, discover, and book parking spaces in a user-friendly manner. It will require integration of payment systems, user profiles, and location services. If you have a strong background in mobile app development and a portfolio showcasing similar projects, we want to hear from you!
Data Sources:

User Profiles:
Fields: User ID (unique), Name, Phone Number (verified), Email (verified), GPS Coordinates (current), Coin Balance, Rating (average).
Data Source: Internal Lovable.dev database.
Parking Spot Listings:
Fields: Listing ID (unique), User ID (who is leaving), GPS Coordinates (parking spot), Time Created, Status (available, claimed, completed), Coin Reward, Geofence Area ID.
Data Source: Internal Lovable.dev database.
Geofence Areas:
Fields: Geofence ID (unique), GPS Coordinates (center), Radius (meters).
Data Source: Internal Lovable.dev database.
Transactions:
Fields: Transaction ID (unique), Sender User ID, Receiver User ID, Coin Amount, Time Stamp.
Data Source: Internal Lovable.dev Database.
User Roles:

Driver Leaving:
Functionality:
Create a parking spot listing:
Capture current GPS coordinates.
Set a coin reward.
Select a geofence area.
Must confirm spot availability before listing is active.
Confirm parking spot transfer.
Receive coins.
Rate the other user.
Driver Seeking:
Functionality:
View available parking spot listings within a selected geofence.
Claim a parking spot listing.
Send coins.
Receive GPS coordinates of the parking spot.
Rate the other user.
Key Features and Logic:

Geofencing:
Implement geofencing to define parking areas.
Users can only view listings within their selected geofence.
Use a mapping component to display geofence areas.
Proximity Matching:
Match drivers seeking parking with drivers leaving spots within the same geofence.
Prioritize listings based on proximity and time created.
Real-Time Notifications:
Use Lovable.dev's notification system to send:
Notifications to drivers seeking when a spot becomes available.
Notifications to drivers leaving when a spot is claimed.
Confirmation notifications.
Implement an in app notification log.
Coin/Payment System:
Integrate Stripe or PayPal for secure coin transactions.
Implement a secure database to track coin balances.
Add a transaction history page for each user.
User Verification:
Require phone number and email verification during signup.
Implement user rating system.
GPS Accuracy:
Use a mapping component to display GPS coordinates.
Provide clear instructions on how to improve GPS accuracy.
Add a manual location input option.
Parking Spot Confirmation:
Add a ‚Äúconfirm spot leaving‚Äù button.
Add a timer to this button. If not pressed, the spot listing is deleted.
Legal Considerations:
Add a terms of service and privacy policy page.
Include a disclaimer stating that the app is a tool and that parking is the user's responsibility.
Battery Optimization:
Optimize GPS tracking to minimize battery usage.
Provide options to adjust location tracking frequency.
Specific Instructions:

Use Lovable.dev's drag-and-drop interface to create the app's UI.
Use Lovable.dev's database integration to connect to the data sources.
Use Lovable.dev's API integrations to connect to Stripe/PayPal and mapping services.
Thoroughly test all features and workflows.
Create a help/FAQ page.
Create a report button for users to report misuse.
Error Handling:

Implement error messages for invalid inputs and failed transactions.
Handle GPS signal loss gracefully.
Implement a dispute resolution process for coin disputes.
UI/UX:

Design a clean and intuitive user interface.
Use clear and concise language.
Provide helpful tooltips and instructions.

title: Update of our App
description:
We are a labor hire company that provides skilled workers to clients on demand. Our workers use a custom-built app to log their timesheets daily, and these records form the basis for payroll processing and client invoicing. However, our current system is inefficient because the backend database is on a separate platform from Google Sheets. As a result, our bookkeeper must manually copy and paste data between systems, slowing down operations.

Our goal is to integrate Google Sheets as the backend database to automate processes, streamline payroll, and eventually integrate AI-driven features for further efficiency.

Project Overview

We need an experienced developer to update our existing app while keeping the current functionality intact. The focus is on integrating Google Sheets as the backend database. We want to ensure that:

All worker, client, and timesheet data is stored and managed via Google Sheets.

The app frontend allows workers to sign up, log timesheets, and view payroll details.

Google Sheets remains fully synchronized with the app, allowing two-way data updates.

Our bookkeeper can manually update the Google Sheets database, and changes should be reflected in the app in real time.

If updating the existing app proves too difficult, we are open to developing a new version based on the current functionality, but with an improved and optimized backend using Google Sheets.

Scope of Work

Phase 1: Google Sheets Integration & App Update

Migrate the current app backend to Google Sheets.

Maintain current functionality while improving performance and stability.

Ensure that all app data (workers, clients, timesheets) is stored in structured Google Sheets tables.

Implement two-way synchronization between Google Sheets and the app.

Maintain existing timesheet calculations (overtime, night shifts, etc.) without rebuilding formulas.

Ensure payroll calculations and invoicing processes remain intact but operate directly from Google Sheets.

Optimize existing automation to reduce manual copy-pasting by our bookkeeper.

Phase 2: Future Developments (Optional, Long-Term Collaboration)

Email Automation: Implement MailerLite API integration for automated email sequences.

Contract Automation: Use SignNow API to automate contract submissions.

AI Agent Deployment: Develop AI agents to analyze worker data and assist in decision-making.

Chatbot Integration: Integrate with Chatbase or another chatbot that can read data in real time and provide workers with relevant information.

Further System Enhancements: Additional automation features to streamline labor hire operations.

Requirements

Proven experience in app development and backend integration.

Strong knowledge of Google Sheets API and real-time data synchronization.

Experience using AI tools for coding efficiency.

Ability to optimize processes while maintaining quality.

Experience with API integrations (MailerLite, SignNow, Chatbase, etc.).

Ability to work with our current designs or adapt to a Figma template.

How to Apply

If you‚Äôre interested in this project, please provide:

Examples of previous work relevant to app development and database integration.

Confirmation that you have the required skills.

Confirmation that you will use AI tools to optimize development speed and cost-effectiveness.

Your estimated timeline and pricing for Phase 1 (Google Sheets integration and app update).

Optional: Your thoughts on future developments and long-term collaboration.

This project offers a long-term opportunity for the right candidate, as we plan to continuously improve and expand the system.

Experience with PICO devices is a plus.

Project Scope

How to Apply

title: Full-Stack Flutter Developer for Exciting Startup
description:
Job Description:

We are an early-stage startup developing an iOS, Android, and Web application that integrates software with physical products to create a unique, shareable experience. We are looking for a highly skilled Flutter developer to take ownership of the development process and help us bring our MVP to market quickly.

This is a remote, contract position on Upwork, with the potential for long-term collaboration. The ideal candidate is experienced in building and deploying Flutter applications for mobile and web, with strong backend integration skills.

Project Scope & Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Develop a fully functional cross-platform app using Flutter (Dart).
‚Ä¢ Ensure a seamless experience across iOS, Android, and Web using a single codebase.
‚Ä¢ Integrate backend services using Supabase (PostgreSQL, Authentication, Real-time Database, Storage).
‚Ä¢ Implement key features, including:
‚Ä¢ User authentication (Google, Apple, Email, Magic Links).
‚Ä¢ Cloud storage and media handling (Uploading, processing, and displaying images/videos).
‚Ä¢ Dynamic UI components and animations.
‚Ä¢ Real-time data synchronization with Supabase.
‚Ä¢ Optimized onboarding flow and user experience.
‚Ä¢ Deploy and maintain the app on the App Store, Google Play, and Web.
‚Ä¢ Optimize app performance for smooth and fast interactions.
‚Ä¢ Set up and manage cloud infrastructure using AWS for hosting, storage, and scalability.
‚Ä¢ Work directly with the founder to iterate and refine the product.

Requirements (Must-Have):
‚Ä¢ Strong experience with Flutter & Dart, including deploying Flutter apps on iOS, Android, and Web.
‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with Supabase (or Firebase) for authentication and database management.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of PostgreSQL (or similar relational databases).
‚Ä¢ Experience building scalable and maintainable Flutter applications.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in working with APIs (REST & GraphQL).
‚Ä¢ Strong UI/UX skills for designing polished, responsive, and intuitive apps.
‚Ä¢ Experience with AWS services (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, or similar).
‚Ä¢ Experience with media storage solutions (AWS S3, Cloudinary, or similar).
‚Ä¢ Version control expertise (Git/GitHub).
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines for automating builds and deployments.
‚Ä¢ Ability to work independently and communicate effectively in a remote environment.

Preferred Qualifications (Nice-to-Have):
‚Ä¢ Experience optimizing Flutter Web applications.
‚Ä¢ Previous work on consumer-facing applications with high user engagement.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with AI-based image/video processing.
‚Ä¢ Experience with AWS Amplify, AWS Lambda, or AWS API Gateway.
‚Ä¢ Background in fast-paced startup environments.

Why Work With Us?
‚Ä¢ High-impact role in an innovative, early-stage startup.
‚Ä¢ Fully remote work with flexible hours.
‚Ä¢ Opportunity for long-term collaboration based on performance.
‚Ä¢ Fast development cycles and meaningful product ownership.

Only apply if you are a developer with shipped projects on the ios / android app store. No agency applications will be considered. If you submit to this job and you are an agency your application will be rejected. In your cover letter please include the word "Purple" so we know you've read this entire job posting carefully.

title: Fitness App Developer Needed
description:
We are looking for a skilled app and web developer to create a user-friendly fitness application. The ideal candidate will have experience in designing and developing mobile apps that cater to fitness enthusiasts. You will be responsible for the complete development cycle, including UI/UX design, backend integration, and testing. A strong understanding of fitness-related features, such as workout tracking, meal planning, and user engagement tools, is crucial. If you‚Äôre passionate about fitness and technology, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!  We already own the domain, and would like to have both a website and app that work together. Our goal will be to have basic mvp ready for internal testing asap. we have a few key ideas also we will add in during design phases. this would be an ongoing maintnence project if sucessful.

some things we look to include and test
1Ô∏è‚É£ Gamification & Habit-Forming Features

‚úÖ Daily Streaks & XP System ‚Äì Users earn XP, level up, and unlock rewards for consistency.
‚úÖ Challenges & Leaderboards ‚Äì Social competition drives engagement. (e.g., ‚Äú30-Day Weight Loss Challenge‚Äù)
‚úÖ Achievement Badges & Milestones ‚Äì Keep users hooked with progression rewards.
‚úÖ AI-Based Progress Feedback ‚Äì Personalized encouragement & insights to boost retention.

üí∞ Monetization Angle: Offer premium-only challenges, extra XP boosts, and custom rewards.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Subscription & Monetization Boosters

‚úÖ Freemium Model (Free + Premium) ‚Äì Lock exclusive content behind a paywall.
‚úÖ AI-Powered Personal Coach ‚Äì AI-driven meal & workout plans with dynamic adjustments ($10-$50/month).
‚úÖ Live Trainer Sessions & Video Workouts ‚Äì Upsell premium access to trainers.
‚úÖ In-App Marketplace ‚Äì Sell supplements, meal plans, or fitness gear.
‚úÖ Affiliate Deals (Supplements, Wearables) ‚Äì Partner with brands to sell products.

üí∞ Monetization Angle: Upsell personal AI coaching, exclusive workouts, and affiliate partnerships.

3Ô∏è‚É£ Social & Viral Growth Mechanics

‚úÖ Referral & Invite Rewards ‚Äì Give users benefits for bringing in friends.
‚úÖ Social Feeds & Community Groups ‚Äì Let users share progress, tips, and workout results.
‚úÖ User-Generated Content (UGC) ‚Äì Encourage users to post workouts, transformations, and meal prep videos.
‚úÖ Shareable Progress Reports ‚Äì Auto-generate Instagram-worthy fitness stats.

üí∞ Monetization Angle: Premium social challenges & exclusive community access.

4Ô∏è‚É£ AI & Personalization

‚úÖ AI-Generated Meal & Workout Plans ‚Äì Customizable by fitness goal & dietary preference.
‚úÖ Voice & Chatbot Coaching ‚Äì 24/7 AI coach for motivation & Q&A.
‚úÖ Smart Workout Adjustments ‚Äì Adaptive workouts based on past performance & fatigue levels.
‚úÖ Calorie Scanner (OCR Tech) ‚Äì Snap a photo, get instant calorie breakdown.

üí∞ Monetization Angle: Charge for personalized AI coaching & meal plans.

5Ô∏è‚É£ Corporate & B2B Revenue Stream

‚úÖ Corporate Wellness Integration ‚Äì Sell bulk licenses to businesses for employee health programs.
‚úÖ Custom Plans for Gyms & Trainers ‚Äì White-label versions for fitness professionals.
‚úÖ Partnerships with Health Brands ‚Äì Cross-promote with wearables (e.g., Fitbit, Apple Health).

üí∞ Monetization Angle: Licensing deals, gym subscriptions, and corporate wellness packages.

üõ† Tech Stack & Development Priorities
‚Ä¢ MVP Priority: Gamification, AI meal/workout plans, subscription system.
‚Ä¢ Scalability: Add AI coaching, community, and partnerships over time.
‚Ä¢ Launch Plan: Focus on viral growth first, then premium features.

üöÄ Final Strategy: Start with gamified fitness + AI coaching + referral system for rapid growth and premium challenges + AI meal plans for strong monetization.

title: Mobile app attribution expert needed for Fintech
description:
Lopay is a fast-growing payment platform operating across multiple countries with iOS and Android apps. We acquire new merchants through various ad channels (Meta, Google, etc.), but we lack precise attribution on where each new signup comes from‚Äîespecially at the ad and campaign level.

We are looking for freelancers with expertise in tracking, analytics, and attribution to help us implement a robust tracking solution that accurately links merchant signups to specific ad sources.

We need 1:1 accurate attribution to work out where all signups and further in-app actions come from.

Customer journey:
install
register
submit KYC documents
take their first payment

Please only apply if you can fix this issue

üõ†Ô∏è Scope of Work (let us know if you have another idea)

1Ô∏è‚É£ Pre-Signup Tracking (Click ‚Üí App Install ‚Üí Signup)
‚Ä¢ Implement UTM-based tracking for web and mobile journeys.
‚Ä¢ Set up deep linking (e.g., using Branch.io, AppsFlyer, Adjust, or Firebase) to attribute mobile app installs to specific ads.
‚Ä¢ Ensure data is stored and passed through the signup process.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Backend Attribution (Signup ‚Üí CRM Matching)
‚Ä¢ Store UTM parameters or referral sources within the Lopay signup flow.
‚Ä¢ Match signup data with ad campaign details in the backend.
‚Ä¢ Build a dashboard/reporting system to view attribution metrics.

3Ô∏è‚É£ Post-Signup Attribution (Meta & Google Ads Matching)
‚Ä¢ Implement Facebook Conversion API (CAPI) & Google Enhanced Conversions for server-side event tracking.
‚Ä¢ Set up offline conversion tracking‚Äîupload hashed emails to Meta & Google Ads for improved attribution.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Alternative Tracking Solutions
‚Ä¢ Create unique promo codes or referral links for different campaigns to track conversions manually.
‚Ä¢ Explore QR code tracking for offline/alternative marketing channels.

üîé Ideal Freelancer Profile

‚úÖ Expertise in Attribution & Tracking (Google Analytics, Facebook CAPI, Google Enhanced Conversions, UTMs)
‚úÖ Experience with Mobile Tracking (AppsFlyer, Branch.io, Adjust, or Firebase)
‚úÖ Knowledge of CRM Integration (HubSpot, Salesforce, or custom databases)
‚úÖ Ability to Build Dashboards & Reports (Google Data Studio, Looker, or custom BI tools)
‚úÖ Strong Communication & Documentation Skills

title: Experienced Full-Stack Developer/Team to Build a Social Networking Application (Mobile + Web)
description:
We are looking for an experienced full-stack developer or a development team to build a social networking application from scratch. The project involves developing a cross-platform mobile app (iOS and Android) and a web-based administrative panel. We already have the user stories and designs ready, and we are now moving into the development phase.

The ideal candidate(s) will have a strong portfolio showcasing similar projects, excellent communication skills, and the ability to manage the project end-to-end, from development to deployment. You will also be responsible for suggesting the best technologies and frameworks to ensure the application is scalable, secure, and high-performing.

Key Responsibilities:

1) Develop a cross-platform mobile application for iOS and Android.
2) Build a web-based administrative panel for managing the application.
3) Collaborate with us to finalize the tech stack and architecture.
4) Ensure the application is scalable, secure, and optimized for performance.
5) Manage the entire development lifecycle, including testing, debugging, and deployment.
6) Provide regular updates and maintain clear communication throughout the project.

Requirements:

1) Proven experience in building social networking applications or similar complex projects.
2) Expertise in full-stack development, including:
- Mobile app development (React Native, Flutter, or native iOS/Android development).
- Backend development (Node.js, Django, Ruby on Rails, or similar).
- Database design and management (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc.).
- Web development for the admin panel (React, Angular, or Vue.js).

title: Senior React Native/Expo Developer - Immediate Start
description:
Project Overview and Company Background
- The project involves creating an application for a company that provides software to local auctioneers and auction houses.
- The application's primary use case is inventory ingestion for heavy equipment brought to auction yards.
- The app aims to bridge the connection between inventory ingestion and catalog availability for online bidding.
- The company lacks expertise in React and React Native, despite having broad software experience.

Technical Challenges and Requirements
- The application must be offline-first due to poor connectivity in remote auction yards and warehouse locations.
- Data synchronization with the cloud is crucial and must be resilient to connection interruptions.
- The app uses Realm as a NoSQL database for local storage.
- Initial hydration of the application involves SSO-based or SAML 2 compliant authentication.
- Delta synchronization strategies are employed for new inventory and changes to existing inventory.
- The API is idempotent, allowing repeated application of changes without harming server-side data structures.
- Memory requirements on Android devices are more stringent due to the variety in device quality.

Current Implementation and Issues
- The application assumes entities are Realm entities, with persistence directly queried in some locations.
- Realm is used for both key-value and deeper level storage, including authentication, user data, and SAML 2 tokens.
- During beta testing, only 7 out of 67 pictures taken of one piece of equipment were successfully uploaded to storage.
- The developer suspects issues with object listening or state invalidation that require expertise in React Native to resolve.

Proposed Solutions and Development Approach
- The new developer suggests implementing a sync queue to store pending changes of Realm objects.
- Each entry in the sync queue will track its status (pending, in progress, failed).
- The sync logic will process the queue when the network is available, marking items as successful or retrying with a backoff strategy.
- Realm transactions will ensure data integrity during synchronization.
- Component lifecycles will be tied to Realm objects via subscriptions to prevent React Native errors when objects are deleted.

Work Style and Communication
- The developer typically works on an EST schedule, available from 9 AM to 5 or 6 PM.
- Daily updates and progress videos will be provided.
- The project uses an Expo system for receiving changes and providing new builds.
- Commits should be small and targeted, avoiding large refactors with numerous changes.
- Code reviews will be conducted throughout the day.
- The developer will work primarily on weekdays, aiming for a 30-hour work week.
- Fluent in English
