title: React Native Developer Needed to Build Macronutrient Tracking with AI
description:
### **Project Overview:**

A GERD-friendly calorie tracking mobile app designed to help users manage their dietary needs while avoiding trigger foods. The app will feature food logging, GERD-safe food identification, and dietary alignment indicators, ensuring users can make informed food choices. The UI will be modern, clean, and intuitive, with a focus on wellness rather than medical themes.

**Designs for the app have been attached.**

### **What is GERD?**

Gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) is a chronic condition where stomach acid frequently flows back into the esophagus, causing discomfort and potential damage over time. Common symptoms include heartburn, regurgitation, and difficulty swallowing. Managing GERD often involves dietary adjustments to avoid trigger foods that can worsen symptoms. This app helps users make informed food choices to support their digestive health and overall well-being.

### **Technology Stack:**

- **Framework:** React Native (for cross-platform compatibility)
- **Backend:** Supabase (for authentication, database management, and API services)
- **AI Integration:** OpenAI API (for personalized food suggestions and GERD-friendly recommendations)
- **Styling:** Tailwind Native (or an equivalent style system for consistency and responsiveness)
- **External APIs:**
    - **USDA FoodData Central API** (for accurate nutritional information)
    - **OpenFoods API** (for barcode scanning and product data retrieval)
    - **OpenAI API** (for AI-powered dietary recommendations)

### **Core Features:**

1. **User Authentication:** Sign-up, login, and profile management using Supabase authentication.
2. **Food Logging:** Users can search and log food entries, tracking calories and nutritional data.
3. **GERD-Friendly Tagging:** A distinct tagging system that highlights GERD-safe and trigger foods.
4. **Dietary Alignment Indicators:** A custom visual system showing how well foods align with GERD dietary needs.
5. **AI-Powered Insights:** Personalized meal recommendations and GERD-related dietary tips powered by OpenAI.
6. **Analytics Dashboard:** Users can view trends, caloric intake, and symptom correlations.
7. **Favorites & Meal Planning:** Save favorite foods and create meal plans based on GERD-friendly options.
8. **Settings & Customization:** Allow users to adjust dietary preferences, notification settings, and tracking goals.
9. **Offline Support:** Enable food logging and basic app functionality without an internet connection.
10. **Push Notifications:** Reminders for meal logging and GERD-specific dietary guidance.
11. **Menu & Barcode Scanning:** Users can scan restaurant menus or packaged food barcodes to quickly identify GERD-friendly options and retrieve nutritional information using USDA and OpenFoods APIs.

### *Write helicopter in the first sentence of your application.

### **Deliverables:**

- Fully functional **React Native app** adhering to the outlined features.
- **Supabase backend** setup with authentication, data storage, and API integration.
- **AI-powered features** using OpenAI API for dietary recommendations.
- Integration with **USDA FoodData Central API** and **OpenFoods API** for food-related data.
- Complete **UI styling** with Tailwind Native or equivalent.
- Source code with proper **documentation** and modular components.
- Deployment guidance and basic post-launch support.

### **Requirements:**

- **Proficiency in React Native** and related libraries.
- **Experience with backend technologies** (e.g., Node.js, Python, etc.).
- **Knowledge of database systems** (SQL/NoSQL).
- **Familiarity with version control** (Git) and CI/CD workflows.
- **Strong problem-solving skills** and attention to detail.
- **Excellent communication skills** and ability to work in a team.

### **You Should Have:**

1. **Use AI code generation daily**, ideally with Cursor IDE.
2. **Experience with complex pixel-perfect UI designs** from Figma to React Native.
3. **Participated in or launched** your own apps on the iOS and Android app stores.

The app will be tested on our farm initially, with potential for future expansion. We need a skilled Flutter developer to build a functional version with a specific interface design (see details below) and a basic web dashboard. Most of our team uses iPhones, so iOS support is required. Different sites have different bin sizes, and the app must allow users to choose the appropriate bin capacity. The home screen will list sites for selection, with administrators having the ability to edit or add new sites, including the number of bins and bin sizes, which remain static unless changed by the admin.

Mobile App (Employee View):
‚Ä¢ Home Screen: A list of existing sites (e.g., custom names) for employees to select when reporting feed levels and mortalities.
‚Ä¢ Reporting Screen:
o Single screen after site selection with a simple animated conical bin shape (based on a feed bin design, adjustable for different capacities, e.g., 15-ton default per site configuration).
o 3 drag points (red dots) to adjust the feed level interactively, with a yellow shaded area indicating the feed level.
o Real-time calculation of feed tons (e.g., 1.5T) and remaining capacity (e.g., 13.5T) based on the site‚Äôs configured bin size.
o Text display: Bin Name (e.g., Bin #1), selected Capacity (e.g., 15T), and calculations (e.g., "Empty Space: 1.5T, Remaining Feed: 13.5T").
o Dropdowns for Line (e.g., Line 1) specific to the selected site.
o Date field (auto-filled) and optional Notes text box.
o Mortality Tracking: Below the bin, a dropdown menu for mortality types (e.g., chronic illness, respiratory, flu) and a text box to enter the number of mortalities (e.g., "1" for 1 pig).
o Green "Submit" button.
‚Ä¢ Support for iOS (primary) and Android (secondary).
Mobile App (Administrator View):
‚Ä¢ Home Screen: Same list of sites as employees, plus an "Admin" button or option.
‚Ä¢ Admin Screen:
o Option to edit existing sites (e.g., update Barn Name, number of bins, bin sizes like 10T, 15T, 20T).
o Option to add new sites with configurable number of bins and bin sizes.
o Changes to bin sizes and numbers remain static unless updated by the admin.
o Simple form with save functionality, syncing to Firebase.
‚Ä¢ Admin access restricted (e.g., password or role-based login).
Web Dashboard (Farm Owner View):
‚Ä¢ Basic table listing submissions (Barn Name, Line, Date, Feed Tons, Remaining Tons, Status, Mortality Details) with thumbnails of the bin graphic, reflecting the site‚Äôs configured bin size.
‚Ä¢ Clickable details to view the adjusted bin shape, notes, mortality type, number of deaths, and status.
‚Ä¢ Status toggle (Pending/Ordered).
‚Ä¢ Admin option to edit site configurations (same as mobile admin screen).
Technical Details:
‚Ä¢ Use Firebase for real-time data syncing between mobile and web.
‚Ä¢ Target iOS primarily (delivered as .ipa file), with Android (.apk) as a secondary option.
‚Ä¢ Simple, functional design based on the attached reference image (conical bin with 3 drag points).
‚Ä¢ Implement a site setup feature to assign different bin sizes (e.g., 10T, 15T, 20T) and number of bins per site, editable only by admins.
‚Ä¢ Store site configurations, bin data, and mortality data in Firebase.
Deliverables:
‚Ä¢ Working mobile app (iOS .ipa and Android .apk) with employee and admin modes.
‚Ä¢ Web dashboard.
‚Ä¢ Source code with comments.
‚Ä¢ Basic testing and bug fixes on iOS.
Timeline
‚Ä¢ Estimated 70-100 hours over 3-4 weeks.
‚Ä¢ Milestones:
o 25% upfront upon contract signing.
o 50% after mobile app completion (iOS focus).
o 25% after web dashboard and final testing.
Budget
‚Ä¢ $3,500 - $5,000 total, negotiable based on experience and timeline.
‚Ä¢ Prefer fixed-price, but open to hourly (max $50/hour).
How to Apply
‚Ä¢ Submit a proposal with:
o Brief overview of your Flutter experience.
o Link to portfolio (e.g., GitHub, app demos).
o Estimated timeline and cost within the budget.
o Any questions or suggestions for the project.
‚Ä¢ Attach or reference the provided image for design inspiration.
Notes
‚Ä¢ This is a prototype for internal testing. Future phases may include additional features (e.g., feed mill integration, Spanish language support).
‚Ä¢ Ownership and Confidentiality: The client will own all intellectual property rights to the deliverables upon full payment. The freelancer agrees to transfer all rights and keep project details confidential, with no reuse or disclosure without prior written consent. A formal contract with these terms will be required before starting.

title: Full-Stack Developer for Customer & Driver Apps + Website (Similar to Instacart/Uber)
description:
Full-Stack Developer for Grocery Delivery Platform like Instacart / Uber

I am looking for a skilled Full-Stack Developer to build, test, and optimize mobile apps (Driver and Customer) and a web platform similar to Instacart or Uber. You will be responsible for developing a seamless and scalable platform that integrates key features such as live order tracking, dynamic driver routing, payment processing, and an anti-scraping mechanism to protect platform integrity. The role involves both frontend and backend development, along with API integrations for routing, payments, and location tracking.

Responsibilities:
- Develop, test and fix mobile applications (iOS & Android) for both customers and drivers, ensuring a smooth and functional user experience.
- Build a responsive and user-friendly web platform using React.js.
- Design and develop backend services and REST APIs with Node.js, ensuring high performance, reliability, and security.
- Integrate Stripe for payment processing, including handling virtual card transactions and other custom payment logic.
- Implement Google Maps API for real-time location tracking and dynamic routing for drivers.
- Design, implement, and manage a scalable database structure in MSSQL to handle transactional and customer data.
- Develop and enforce anti-scraping mechanisms, including rate limiting, CAPTCHA, IP blocking, and content obfuscation.
- Perform extensive testing, debugging, and performance optimization for both the mobile apps and the web platform.
- Work closely with stakeholders to refine and improve user experiences based on data-driven insights.
- Ensure the platform is scalable and capable of handling high traffic volumes.
- Deploy and manage the application on AWS cloud infrastructure.
- Integrate and upload the REST API to the GoDaddy domain, ensuring proper configuration and deployment.

Skills & Requirements:
Frontend:
- Expertise in React.js for building an intuitive, responsive, and visually appealing web interface.

Backend:
- Strong experience with Node.js for developing efficient and scalable backend systems.
- Experience in designing and implementing RESTful APIs.

Payment Integration:
- Proficiency in integrating Stripe for payment processing, including virtual card payments and custom customer algorithms.

Payment Integration:
- Proficiency in integrating Stripe for payment processing, including virtual card payments and custom customer algorithms.
- Ability to customize Stripe to assign virtual or physical cards to drivers after onboarding.
- Knowledge of implementing security deposit logic, where double the order amount is temporarily charged to customers for security and the remaining balance is refunded after delivery.

Routing & Location Tracking:
- Expertise in integrating Google Maps API for real-time tracking and optimizing driver routing.

Database:
- Experience with MSSQL for managing and storing large volumes of transactional and customer data.

Cloud Infrastructure:
- Familiarity with AWS for cloud hosting, infrastructure management, and deployment.

UI/UX Design:
- Strong understanding of UI/UX best practices to create seamless and intuitive user interfaces.
- Experience with animations to enhance user engagement and interactivity.

Security & Anti-Scraping Mechanisms:
- Knowledge of implementing anti-scraping techniques such as rate limiting, CAPTCHA, IP blocking, and content obfuscation.

Testing & Debugging:

Version Control & Collaboration:

Additional Skills:
- Knowledge of Visual Basic for coding and automation tasks.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Previous experience in developing delivery or ride-sharing apps with similar functionalities.
- Understanding of surge pricing algorithms and dynamic order batching systems.
- Hands-on experience with cloud infrastructure on AWS.
- Proven track record of integrating APIs for payment processing, mapping, and routing.
- Strong focus on security, especially regarding data protection and platform integrity.

Project Details:

- Backend: Node.js with REST API
- Database: MSSQL
- Hosting: AWS
- Payment Integration: Stripe
- APIs: Google Maps API for routing and location tracking

- Domain Deployment: Integration and upload to GoDaddy domain

title: Develop a Mobile App for an Express and Logistic Company
description:
UR EXPRESS Mobile App ‚Äì Full Project Description
1. Overview:
App Name: UR EXPRESS
Tagline: Your Online Shopping Assistant
Purpose:
UR EXPRESS is an innovative ‚Äúbuy for me‚Äù service designed to enable individuals, small businesses, and large corporations in Kurdistan and Iraq to shop online with cash. The app simplifies online shopping, tracking, and delivery by acting as an intermediary that allows users to purchase products from global online stores and have them delivered to their locations. The app streamlines the user experience for both individual consumers and business owners who need access to international products not available locally.
Target Audience:
Individuals: Consumers who wish to buy products from international stores.
Small Businesses: Resellers purchasing inventory from international e-commerce platforms.
Large Companies: Organizations procuring bulk items like stationery or industrial supplies from global markets.
Supported Platforms: iOS, Android, and web-based admin panel.
Languages Supported:
Kurdish (RTL support)
Arabic (RTL support)
English
Founded: 2019 by Source Tech

2. Mobile App Features for End-Users:
2.1 Home Screen:
The home screen is the central hub of the UR EXPRESS app, where users can access essential features and quickly navigate through the app.
Personalized Welcome Message:
Upon logging in, users are greeted with a personalized welcome message that includes their name and account details for a more customized experience.
Balance Display:
A prominent section shows the user‚Äôs account balance, which is the remaining funds in their wallet that can be used for orders.
Zone Selection:
Users can select their preferred shipping zone (USA, UAE, Turkey, UK, Europe, Global) via a dropdown menu, customizing their shopping experience by selecting the region they want to shop from.
Account Summary:
This section provides a quick snapshot of the user's activity:
Purchased Orders: Total number of orders made by the user.
Arrived Orders: Number of items that have reached the warehouse in the selected shipping zone.
Delivered Orders: Number of items delivered to the user‚Äôs address.
Total Orders: Total number of orders processed by the user.
Promotional Banner:
Dynamic promotional banners will be displayed here, showcasing offers, discounts, new arrivals, or upcoming sales events.

2.2 Orders Screen:
The orders screen allows users to view and manage their past and present purchases.
Order List:
Displays a comprehensive list of the user‚Äôs orders, showing essential details such as:
Order ID
Product Name
Order Status (e.g., Pending, Shipped, Delivered)
Shipping Zone (where the order was shipped from)
Search & Filter:
The user can filter orders by criteria such as:
Date Range
Zone of purchase
Order Status (e.g., completed, pending, shipped)
Users can also search for orders by their Order ID or Product Name.
Order Details:
Clicking on any order will show detailed information, such as:
Product Name, Description, Quantity, and Zone
Payment Status (whether it‚Äôs paid, pending, or processed)
Real-time tracking links (integrating third-party services such as FedEx, DHL, USPS)

2.3 New Order Screen:
This screen allows users to create a new order by providing relevant product information.
Order Form:
Product URL: A text input where users can paste the URL of the product they wish to buy.
Quantity: Option to specify the number of units required.
Zone Selection: Dropdown to choose the shipping region.
City: Input for the delivery city.
Additional Specifications: Optional field to specify any additional requirements (e.g., color, size).
Create Order Button:
Once the user completes the form, they can click the ‚ÄúCreate Order‚Äù button, which will validate and process the order for further steps.

2.4 Checkout Screen:
The checkout screen facilitates finalizing the order and making payments.
Order Summary:
This section shows:
Product details (name, quantity, price)
Shipping address
Order total with breakdowns (taxes, discounts)
Payment Options:
Various payment methods are available:
Wallet Balance: The option to pay with the user's existing account balance.
PayPal
Stripe
Local Payment Gateways (to accommodate local payment methods used in Kurdistan and Iraq)

2.5 Support Screen:
To provide ongoing support and assistance to users, this screen features several support options.
In-App Chat:
Real-time direct messaging with the UR EXPRESS customer support team for troubleshooting, inquiries, or general assistance.
Ticket Submission:
Users can submit a support ticket if they face an issue, providing detailed information about the problem. They can also attach files or images (e.g., screenshots) to help resolve the issue.
FAQs:
A list of frequently asked questions and common answers will be available to help users quickly find solutions to common issues or queries.

2.6 Membership Plans Screen:
The Membership Plans section offers users the option to subscribe to exclusive benefits.
Personal Account (Free Account):
Users can place orders and combine shipments to reduce shipping costs.
Users will receive notifications (via app and SMS) when orders arrive at the warehouse.
Paid Account (Membership):
Users enjoy discounted shipping rates.
Faster processing times for orders.
Exclusive offers, promotions, and deals available only for paid members.

3. Additional Features & Requirements:
Multi-Language Support:
The app will support multiple languages (Kurdish, Arabic, and English) with full RTL (right-to-left) text support for Arabic.
Push Notifications:
Users will receive notifications for:
Order updates (e.g., shipped, delivered)
Special offers and promotions
Account balance alerts
Account & Settings:
Users can access their profile, update personal information, change their password, and review previous transactions.
The Settings screen will include options to manage account preferences, payment methods, shipping zones, and membership plans.
Transaction History & Balance Management:
Users can view their transaction history, including past payments and wallet top-ups. They will also be able to add funds to their wallet.

4. Admin Panel Features:
The UR EXPRESS Admin Panel will be used by the app administrators to manage the entire platform, including user accounts, orders, product tracking, and payment processing.
User Management:
Admins can view, edit, and delete user accounts, track activity, and manage subscriptions to the service.
Order Management:
Admins can view, update, and track user orders, including payment statuses and shipment tracking.
Promotions & Offers:
Admins can create, edit, and delete promotional banners or offers that appear on the app‚Äôs homepage.
Product Tracking & Integration:
Admins can integrate with shipping platforms like FedEx, USPS, and DHL to manage real-time tracking of orders and shipments.
Payment Management:
Admins can oversee all transactions, track wallet balances, and manage payment gateways (PayPal, Stripe, local methods).

5. Technical Specifications:
Backend Architecture:
Cloud-based solution with scalable architecture to support thousands of users and real-time order processing.
Security:
SSL encryption for secure transactions and data protection. Two-factor authentication (2FA) for user account security.
Real-Time Integration:
Real-time order tracking integration with major logistics partners (FedEx, DHL, USPS).

Integrating a calorie counter to allow users to track their food intake and calories burned.
Building workout tracking features like exercise logs, daily activity tracking, and progress reports.
Designing a simple, clean, and engaging user interface to create the best user experience.
Ensuring the app is secure, bug-free, and works smoothly across all devices.
Collaborating closely with our team to hit project goals and deadlines.

A good understanding of fitness tracking features, especially calorie counting, workout logs, and nutrition data.
Familiarity with third-party APIs for nutrition data and calorie tracking.
The ability to implement real-time data updates and create user-friendly interfaces.

title: Flutter Developer Needed for App Development
description:
Title: Mobile App Development for Admin, Dealer, and Retailer Management

Description:
We are looking for a skilled mobile app developer to build two interconnected apps for our business. The apps will have three main user roles: Admin, Dealer, and Retailer. The goal is to streamline order management, product tracking, advertisements, and user engagement.

App 1: Admin Panel

This app will be used by admins to manage products, dealers, and retailers.

Key Features:

1. Login Functionality ‚Äì Secure admin login.


2. Product Management (CRUD) ‚Äì Add, edit, update, and delete products.


3. Dealer Management ‚Äì Add and update dealer details.


4. Retailer Management ‚Äì View and block retailers.


5. Order Approval:

Dealers place bulk orders.

Admins receive notifications for new orders.

Admin reviews and approves orders.

The approving admin‚Äôs name should be visible in the order details.

Order details should include product names and quantities.

Admin updates the approval date.



6. Order Tracking:

Once approved, dealers get notified.

Dealers make payments, and admins receive payment notifications.

After payment, the admin dispatches the order.



7. Homepage:

Scrolling ads at the top.

Product listings below.

Clicking on a product shows full details.



8. Advertisement Management:

Admin can add new advertisements.

Admin approves ads submitted by dealers.

Ads should be displayed based on location.



9. Product Sales Graph: View the sales performance of all products.


10. Dealer Sales Graph: View and track sales for all dealers. Clicking a dealer shows their product sales graph.


11. Retailer Sales Graph: View and track sales for all retailers. Clicking a retailer shows their product sales graph.




---

App 2: Dealer & Retailer App

This app will have three user roles: Users, Dealers, and Retailers.

1. User Role:

Homepage with scrolling ads and product listings.

Clicking a product shows full details.

Users enter only their mobile number and city to access the app.

View nearby retailers.


2. Dealer Role:

1. Login Functionality


2. Homepage


3. Add New Order: Dealers can place bulk orders.


4. Track My Orders: Dealers can track their placed orders.


5. Retailer Management: Dealers can add new retailers.


6. Retailer Orders: Dealers can add and manage retailer orders.


7. Product Sales Graph: View sales data of products.


8. Retailer Sales Graph: View all retailer sales data. Clicking a retailer shows their product-wise sales graph.


9. Advertisement Management:

Dealers can submit scrolling ads for admin approval.

Ads are displayed based on the selected city.

If no dealer ads are available, admin ads are shown by default.



10. My Profile: Dealers can view and update their profile.



3. Retailer Role:

1. Login Functionality


2. Homepage


3. Product Sales Graph: View product-wise sales data.


4. My Profile: View and update profile.




---

Project Requirements:

Cross-platform development (Android & iOS preferred).

Clean and user-friendly UI/UX.

Secure authentication system.

Notifications for order approvals, payments, and dispatch.

Location-based advertisement display.

Graphical representation of sales data.


If you have experience in developing similar applications, please share your portfolio and estimated timeline.

title: Mobile Automation Engineer (Appium & ADB) ‚Äì Automated Device Management System
description:
We are seeking an experienced Mobile Automation Engineer with strong expertise in Appium and ADB to develop an automated device management system. In this project, you will create a solution to execute Java-based test scripts across multiple Android devices simultaneously, manage device connectivity/status, and log execution results to a database. This is a short-term contract (approximately 1‚Äì2 weeks) with a fixed-price budget, focusing on building a robust, high-performance automation framework for Android devices.

Key Responsibilities

Automate Device Interaction: Use Appium (for UI automation) and ADB (Android Debug Bridge) to automate interactions on Android devices (launch apps, perform UI actions, handle system events, etc.).
Multi-Device Management: Handle multiple Android devices in parallel ‚Äì manage device connections (USB/Wi-Fi), track each device‚Äôs status (connected, in-use, idle), and ensure reliable communication with all devices.
ADB Shell Command Execution: Write and run ADB shell commands on devices for various tasks (installing/uninstalling apps, clearing app data, retrieving logs, rebooting devices, etc.) as part of the automation scripts.
Results Logging: Implement logging of test execution results and device data into a SQL database (PostgreSQL or MySQL). This includes recording test outcomes, errors, device info, timestamps, and any relevant metrics for reporting and analysis.
Performance Optimization: Optimize the automation framework to handle multiple parallel test executions. Ensure efficient use of resources so that increasing the number of connected devices has minimal impact on execution time or stability.
Required Skills & Experience

Appium & ADB Expertise: Proven experience with mobile test automation on Android using Appium and ADB. You should be comfortable setting up Appium for multiple devices and using ADB commands for device control.
Java & TestNG Proficiency: Strong skills in Java programming, with hands-on experience using TestNG (or a similar test framework) to design and execute test suites. Ability to write clean, maintainable, and well-structured test code is a must.
Multi-Device Concurrency: Deep understanding of handling concurrent sessions on multiple devices. Experience with running tests in parallel (e.g., using multiple Appium server instances or threading) and managing device UDIDs for targeting specific devices.
ADB Command-Line Knowledge: Familiarity with common ADB command-line operations and scripts. For example, you should know how to use commands like adb shell, adb devices, adb install, etc., within automation scripts to perform device actions beyond the UI automation.
Database Logging: Experience integrating test automation with databases. Ability to connect to PostgreSQL/MySQL from Java, and insert or update records (such as test results or logs) programmatically. Knowledge of JDBC or ORM tools for Java is a plus.
Problem-Solving & Optimization: Strong debugging skills to troubleshoot issues on different Android devices (OS versions, OEM variations). Ability to optimize performance and memory usage of the test runs, ensuring the solution scales with multiple devices.
Project Details

Timeline: The project is expected to be completed within 1‚Äì2 weeks from the start date. This includes development, testing on multiple devices, and delivering a fully functional solution.
Fixed-Price Contract: This job is a fixed-price project. Payment will be tied to successful delivery of the device management automation system as per the requirements. (You can specify the budget or range here if desired.)
Deliverables: A working automated device management system capable of the above responsibilities, along with documentation (setup instructions, usage guide) and basic test results to demonstrate functionality.
Collaboration: You will be working independently but will have access to our team for questions, clarifications, and any necessary resources. Communication will be via [email/Slack/your tool of choice] and we expect regular updates on progress.
How to Apply

If you are interested in this project and meet the requirements, please apply with the following:

Relevant Experience: Briefly describe your past experience with Appium, ADB, and Android automation. Highlight projects where you handled multiple devices, used TestNG (or similar frameworks), or logged results to a database.
Timeline Confirmation: Confirm that you are available to start immediately and can dedicate enough time to complete this project within 1‚Äì2 weeks. Mention how you plan to approach the timeline to ensure on-time delivery.
Fixed-Price Bid: Provide your fixed-price quote for the entire project. The bid should account for all aspects of development and delivery. (Optionally, you can break down the cost by major milestones if relevant.)
Please also feel free to share any relevant code samples or project links that demonstrate your expertise in mobile automation or similar projects (if available). We are looking for a candidate who is proactive, detail-oriented, and can deliver a reliable solution within a short timeframe.
skills: ['Automated Testing', 'Performance Testing', 'Android', 'WordPress', 'Appium', 'Software QA', 'Data Scraping', 'Java', 'Lead Generation', 'JavaScript', 'Web Testing']

title: Full Stack Developer for On-Demand Delivery Mobile App
description:
We are seeking an experienced Full Stack Developer to create a robust on-demand delivery mobile application. The ideal candidate will be responsible for both front-end and back-end development, ensuring a seamless user experience. You will work closely with our product team to implement features, optimize performance, and troubleshoot any issues that arise. If you have a strong portfolio showcasing your mobile app development skills, we want to hear from you!

**Job Description:**

We are seeking a talented and experienced **Full Stack Developer** to build an on-demand delivery mobile app that seamlessly integrates with third-party route planners and delivery management systems such as **Detrack** and **Shipday**. The ideal candidate will have experience developing mobile applications from the ground up and be proficient in backend, frontend, and third-party API integration.

### **Key Responsibilities:**
- Design, develop, and deploy a mobile app for on-demand delivery services.
- Implement and integrate third-party services like **Detrack** and **Shipday** to optimize delivery routing and management.
- Build a clean, intuitive, and user-friendly interface for drivers and customers.
- Develop and maintain the backend system to handle user data, orders, and delivery workflows.
- Ensure the app is scalable, secure, and can handle high traffic efficiently.
- Collaborate with product managers and other stakeholders to refine features and improve the app.
- Write clean, well-documented code and conduct code reviews.
- Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize the application for performance and user experience.

### **Required Skills & Qualifications:**
- Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer with a strong portfolio of mobile app development.
- Strong knowledge of mobile development platforms (iOS and Android) using **React Native**, **Flutter**, or native technologies.
- Proficiency in backend technologies such as **Node.js**, **Express**, **Ruby on Rails**, or similar.
- Experience integrating third-party APIs, especially delivery management and route planning systems like **Detrack** and **Shipday**.
- Familiarity with cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud, or similar) for app hosting and scalability.
- Strong understanding of databases (SQL/NoSQL) and server management.
- Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and a passion for delivering high-quality software.
- Strong communication skills and the ability to work in an agile team environment.

### **Preferred Skills:**
- Experience in building and managing on-demand service platforms.
- Knowledge of geolocation and real-time tracking technologies.
- Understanding of delivery workflows and logistics operations.

### **How to Apply:**
If you have the expertise to build a robust and scalable delivery mobile app, please submit your proposal with the following:
- A brief summary of your experience relevant to this project.
- Examples of previous mobile apps you've developed, especially any delivery-related apps.
- Your approach to integrating third-party systems like Detrack or Shipday.
- Estimated timeline and project cost.

We look forward to hearing from developers who are passionate about creating innovative and efficient solutions in the on-demand delivery space.

This is an exciting opportunity to be part of a growing industry with a chance to have a significant impact. Apply now!
